docs.text: Home Welcome to the offical documentation for luagame . What is luagame? luagame is a 2d game library for Roblox , it makes making 2d games in roblox. Current games that use Luagame None If you want your game to be here, contact Bungfro#1519 on discord.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Welcome to the offical documentation for luagame .
docs.title: Home

docs.text: luagame is a 2d game library for Roblox , it makes making 2d games in roblox.
docs.title: What is luagame?

docs.text: None If you want your game to be here, contact Bungfro#1519 on discord.
docs.title: Current games that use Luagame

docs.text: Installation It is recommended to put the module, in ReplicatedStorage , as the client will be using it. How do I install the module? Download the rbxm attached to the latest release from GitHub Releases , or obtain the module from the Roblox Library Place the module in ReplicatedStorage
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: It is recommended to put the module, in ReplicatedStorage , as the client will be using it.
docs.title: Installation
